title: Real-time payments gaining ground fast in Asia: JP Morgan
description: Many Asian countries, including India, are moving away from older payment methods like ACH in favor of real-time systems such as UPI. JP Morgan Chase is investing in distributed ledger technology and partnering with ONDC to support this shift and enhance e-commerce and financial services.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
